attributes.action: DON'T postpone life dependent cancer appointments for Covid Booster target
attributes.additional_details: Do not undo the incredible work that the NHS have done to get up to date with Cancer appointments and treatment. Even a couple of weeks delay can have a devastating affect on someone's chances.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson said today that in order to hit the new target for Covid Booster jabs, some appointments such as those for Cancer patients would need to be postponed.

A delay in treatment can massively affect the prognosis for those with aggressive/rare forms of Cancer. They need to be prioritised.

rejection.details:
Changes to NHS operations to increase capacity to deliver the Covid-19 booster programme are an operational matter for the NHS, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament.

You can read more about these changes here: https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/publication/jcvi-advice-in-response-to-the-emergence-of-the-b-1-1-529-omicron-variant-next-steps-for-deployment/

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603596
